disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Gift of the Drowned Ones.

description.value: Innate: Pyke's  maximum health cannot increase except through growth (per level), instead he gains「  1 bonus attack damage per 14 bonus health. 」「 (7.143% bonus health)  bonus attack damage. 」

description2.value: Pyke also stores 25% − 50% (based on level) of the damage he takes from enemy champions as Grey Health on his health bar, up to 80 (+ 800% bonus AD), with an upper cap of 60% of his maximum health.

description3.value: When Pyke is unseen by enemies, he rapidly consumes his Grey Health to heal for the same amount.

description4.value: Hidden innate: Pyke gains 1 bonus movement speed while in the river.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Game elements that increase health based on the champion's health (e.g Cinderhulk, Gargoyle Stoneplate's, Overgrowth) will increase the health before getting converted by Gift of the Drowned Ones, thus granting increased bonus AD. Spirit Visage and Grievous Wounds take effect after Gift of the Drowned Ones's healing cap. Pyke's Grey Health does not have a time limit, and will stay on his health bar until Pyke leaves enemy vision or dies. Since Pyke's maximum health cannot be increased, Gift of the Drowned Ones reaches the upper cap of 60% of maximum health at 35 − 149.75 (based on level) bonus attack damage. disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Bone Skewer.

target range.value: 400 − 1100 (based on channel time)

width.value: 140 / 200

description.value: Active: Pyke charges for up to 3 seconds, increasing Bone Skewer's range while being slowed by 20%. Bone Skewer can be recast at any time within its duration.

description2.value: Recast: Pyke hurls his harpoon in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy struck, pulling them towards his direction, slowing them by 90% for 1 second, and briefly revealing them.

description3.value: Releasing the ability within 0.4 seconds causes Pyke to instead thrust his blade in the target direction, dealing the same damage to the closest enemy champion, or closest enemy if no champion is hit.

description4.value: If Pyke is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Bone Skewer is cancelled and the ability is put on full  cooldown but refunds  half the mana cost.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Wind Wall and Unbreakable will only block the charged ability. Flash can be used during the cast time and Bone Skewer will affect enemies at the new location. Pyke can still use summoner spells besides Flash, Teleport, Hexflash, and Mark / Dash while hurling the harpoon but he cannot perform any other action. The following table refers for interactions while Pyke is channeling: Type Charge channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Interrupts Movement Allowed Items Usable N/A Disabled All items are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Disabled, but can use trinkets Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled Teleport Recall Interrupted by Hexflash (Recasts) Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Ghostwater Dive.

description.value: Active: Pyke submerges into water, entering camouflage for 5 seconds and gaining 40% (+ 1.5% per 1 Lethality)  bonus movement speed that decays over the duration. Enemies are notified if Pyke is within 1500 units of them.

description2.value: Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends Ghostwater Dive.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * When Pyke is hidden nearby in his Ghostwater Dive, sharks will circle underneath nearby enemies' feet and a sound will be played, changing based on the amount of health they have left. Enemies will hear a disturbing deadly warning tone if their health bar is under the threshold of Death from Below. The maximum amount of  bonus movement speed gained possible from all lethality sources is 154.5%. Last Updated: August 3rd, 2020. Relevant mathematics: Youmuu's Wraithblade: + 37.5% bonus MS Youmuu's Ghostblade: + 27% bonus MS Duskblade of Draktharr: + 31.5% bonus MS Sanguine Blade: + 27% bonus MS while Blood Pursuit is active + 15% bonus MS while inactive Umbral Glaive: + 18% bonus MS Edge of Night: + 15% bonus MS Serrated Dirk: + 15% bonus MS Sudden Impact: + 10.5% bonus MS Total Increased Percent: 37.5% + 31.5% + 27% + 18% + 15% + 15% + 10.5% = 154.5% bonus MS Total Bonus Movement Speed: 154.5% + 40% = 194.5%
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Phantom Undertow.

effect radius.value: 110

width.value: 110

description.value: Active: Pyke dashes in the target direction, leaving behind a Phantom for 1 second.

description2.value: Afterwards, the Phantom returns to Pyke, stunning enemies around it and those it passes through along the way for 1.25 (+ 0.1 per 10 Lethality) seconds. Enemy champions also take physical damage.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The dash distance can be extended to up to 900 units (estimated) when targeting across terrain. Like most projectiles, the flying Phantom cannot hit targets whose center is behind the position it originates at or beyond the position it catches up to Pyke at, but the spell can hit targets behind its origin as long as their hitbox radius overlaps with the original unit Phantom's 110-radius check at the end of its lifespan. The maximum increase in stun duration possible from all lethality sources is 1.03 seconds, with the base duration included for a total of 2.28 seconds. Last Updated: April 11, 2020. Relevant mathematics: Youmuu's Wraithblade: + 0.25 seconds Youmuu's Ghostblade: + 0.18 seconds Duskblade of Draktharr: + 0.21 seconds Sanguine Blade: + 0.18 seconds while Blood Pursuit is active + 0.10 seconds while inactive Umbral Glaive: + 0.12 seconds Edge of Night: + 0.10 seconds Serrated Dirk: + 0.10 seconds Sudden Impact: + 0.07 seconds Total Increased Duration: 0.25 + 0.21 + 0.18 + 0.12 + 0.10 + 0.10 + 0.07 = 1.03 seconds Total Stun Duration: 1.25 + 1.03 = 2.28 seconds
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Death from Below.

description.value: Active: Pyke marks the target area with an X before striking it, executing enemy champions below 250 − 550 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 1.5 per 1 Lethality)  health while dealing「 50% of the amount as physical damage 」「 125 − 275 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) (+ 0.75 per 1 Lethality) physical damage 」to non-champion enemy units and enemy champions not within the threshold for execution.

description2.value: If Death from Below hits an enemy champion or one dies inside it, Pyke will blink to the center of the X. For the latter case Pyke also gains the ability to recast within 20 seconds at no cost.

description3.value: Each execution grants one 'Your Cut' to both Pyke and the last assisting ally, instead of its natural assist gold. In addition, each enemy champion killed inside the X by an ally grants Pyke two stacks of 'Your Cut'.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

damagetype.value: Physical damage / True damage

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Applies raw damage to executed targets and area damage to targets above the threshold. Death from Below cannot execute decoys. They are always dealt 50% physical damage. Only the target's current health will count as Pyke's damage in post-game statistics and  spell vamp healing if executed. If the target's current health is less than 50% of the post-mitigation non-executing damage, Pyke will heal less from spell vamp. If the target is saved by resurrection or is in a zombie state, Death from Below does not grant 'Your Cut' nor the recast. Spell shield does not prevent Pyke from blinking. Pyke is special cased to not blink from Death from Below if it hits an enemy champion while he's suppressed. If an enemy champion dies inside the X before Death from Below performs, Pyke will be shown as having received an assist in the kill feed, but this will not grant him takedown effects. Death from Below cannot be interrupted; Pyke will always appear at the target location if enemy champions are caught inside the X even if he is moved (e.g. by being displaced) during the cast time. The maximum execution threshold increase gained possible from all lethality sources is 154.5 health. Last Updated: April 11, 2020. Relevant mathematics: Youmuu's Wraithblade: + 37.5 health Youmuu's Ghostblade: + 27 health Duskblade of Draktharr: + 31.5 health Sanguine Blade: + 27 health while Blood Pursuit is active + 15 health while inactive Umbral Glaive: + 18 health Edge of Night: + 15 health Serrated Dirk: + 15 health Sudden Impact: + 10.5 health Total Increased Execution Threshold: 37.5 + 31.5 + 27 + 18 + 15 + 15 + 10.5 = 154.5 health Total Execution Threshold: 404.5 − 704.5 (based on level) + 80% bonus AD health
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
